heading: HB00636
0: AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9023, ENTITLED AN ACT DECLARING THE FIFTEENTH (15TH) DAY OF AUGUST OF EVERY YEAR AS A SPECIAL NON-WORKING HOLIDAY IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF CATARMAN, PROVINCE OF CAMIGUIN, TO BE KNOWN AS CATARMAN DAY, BY MOVING THE DATE OF CATARMAN DAY TO THE THIRTIETH (30TH) DAY OF AUGUST OF EVERY YEAR

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00636
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9023, ENTITLED AN ACT DECLARING THE FIFTEENTH (15TH) DAY OF AUGUST OF EVERY YEAR AS A SPECIAL NON-WORKING HOLIDAY IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF CATARMAN, PROVINCE OF CAMIGUIN, TO BE KNOWN AS CATARMAN DAY, BY MOVING THE DATE OF CATARMAN DAY TO THE THIRTIETH (30TH) DAY OF AUGUST OF EVERY YEAR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMUALDO, XAVIER JESUS D.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
NATURE : Others
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
MOTHER BILL: HB05203
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON REVISION OF LAWS ON 2016-07-27
